testcase.name: Verify that the 'Đặt hàng' pop up appears when user clicks 'Đặt hàng' button
Verify that the information popup appears when user orders successfully
Verify that the error message is shown when user leaves password blank
Verify that the error message is shown when user enters invalid password
Verify that the total price in cart is equal to total price in order
Verify that the error message is shown when user leaves 'Họ và tên' blank
Verify that the error message is shown when user enters address less than 15 characters
